detailed_metrics_by_round.actual_question: (Reading) No, it was never intended that the District of Columbia be a state. It is a district. In theory no one should live in D.C., only work there. (Reading) I found it sad that the story spent so much time talking about what steps to take in order to get a good weave, but didn't talk about where to go or what to do in order to get good styling options for our hair in its natural state. detailed_metrics_by_round.actual_question: To write us, just log on to NPR and click on Contact Us. When you get there, you'll see lots of shows to choose from. Make sure you pick News and Notes when you write to us.
detailed_metrics_by_round.previous_answer: And be sure to tell us where you're writing from and how to pronounce your name. Thank you.
